Read in Data
```{r}
data <- crop(brick(here("data", "era5_temp_2020.nc")), c((360 + (x_min - .5)), 360 + (x_max + .5), (y_min - .5), (y_max + .5)))

ca_counties <- st_crop(counties("CA"), c(xmin = x_min, xmax = x_max, ymin = y_min, ymax = y_max)) %>%
  filter(GEOID %in% c("06003", "06109", "06043", "06009")) %>% 
  st_as_sf()
```
